name: Project Inca
description:
Project Inca is a roguelike FPS game taking place in an ancient temple. Traverse the temple depths, find powerful items, and face off against the guardians within. Players can venture into the temple alone, or gather their friends to face the peril. Defeat your enemies, find weapon mods to improve your arsenal, and level up to become stronger in order to reach the heart of the temple.

Credits:

Nathan Tuck - Game Designer and Sound Designer

Marcus Vine - Art Lead

Christopher Grigor - Artist

Kristian Menes - Project Manager and Sound Lead

Myles Cragg - Tools Programmer and Plugin Programmer

Mathew Kostrzewa - Gameplay & AI Programmer and Game Designer
